name: Wing Commander IV: The Price of Freedom
summary: Commander IV: The Price of Freedom is the fourth main game in Chris Roberts' Wing Commander science fiction space combat simulator video game series, produced by Origin Systems and released by Electronic Arts for the PC in 1996 and the Sony PlayStation in 1997 (the game was also released on the North American PlayStation Network Store in 2009).
info:
• 平台: PlayStation
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: MS-DOS
  • 游戏类型: Space combat simulation
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 发行日期: MS-DOS, Windows & Mac OS: NA February 12, 1996, EU 1996. PlayStation: NA May 14, 1997, EU June, 1997. PlayStation Network: NA December 22, 2009
